title.native: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget

production.country: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

director.name: Sam Fell
director.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: Having pulled off an escape from Tweedy's farm, Ginger has found a peaceful island sanctuary for the whole flock. But back on the mainland the whole of chicken-kind faces a new threat, and Ginger and her team decide to break in.
